description: Dialog.Root - The root component that provides context and state management

scrollBehavior.description: How scrolling behavior is handled when content overflows
scrollBehavior.name: scrollBehavior

placement.description: Placement of the dialog in the viewport
placement.name: placement

isOpen.description: Whether the dialog is open (controlled mode)
isOpen.name: isOpen

defaultOpen.description: Whether the dialog is open by default (uncontrolled mode)
defaultOpen.name: defaultOpen

isDismissable.description:
Whether the dialog can be dismissed by clicking the backdrop or pressing Escape.
If true, clicking outside the dialog or pressing Escape will close it.
isDismissable.name: isDismissable

isKeyboardDismissDisabled.description:
Whether keyboard dismissal (Escape key) is disabled.
If true, pressing Escape will NOT close the dialog.
isKeyboardDismissDisabled.name: isKeyboardDismissDisabled

shouldCloseOnInteractOutside.description:
Function to determine whether the dialog should close when interacting outside.
Receives the event and returns true to allow closing, false to prevent.
shouldCloseOnInteractOutside.name: shouldCloseOnInteractOutside

onOpenChange.description:
Callback fired when the dialog open state changes
@param isOpen - Whether the dialog is now open
onOpenChange.name: onOpenChange
